name: Zombie Meets Brick
description:
This was made for the ScoreJam Arcade Controls Jam

Controls are direction keys to move and spacebar to push bricks

You can use an XBOX controller as well (Press Y to push bricks)

Score is determined by number of zombies killed

Fuller attribution here:

Squash sound by Natty23

Scream sound by TheSubber13

Moaning sound by Gneube

BGM is "Dark Moon" by Joshua McLean

Font is ZombieTai and Mont

Shader Graph Tutorial by Daniel Ilett
